title: 'have to say good product in budget price'
body: 'best one for rental flats . it looks quite nice actually and even in dull room. the velvet feel and shining is making room brighter. after the room started looking better  we even got a lamp to go with it'

title: 'Simple yet very elegant'
body: 'This festival we bought a little gift for our living room . Which is this 3seqter sofa . sofa which we have received is of beyond our expectations. Very soft fabric used . Foam is also of a very Firm quality. Happy 😊😁 Very happy ☺️😁 Beyond Happiness ☺️😊'

title: 'reasonable to purchase from furny'
body: 'price was perfect along with the card discount ir was a good buy . should have got a two seater as well'
